response.original_title: Sheavy: Republic? At the Masonic Temple
response.overview: Newfoundland metalheads Sheavy rock the house in this 2005 performance filmed live at the Masonic Temple Ballroom in their homeland. Eighty lucky fans won tickets to get up close and personal with the band at this invite-only show. With hard-hitting licks reminiscent of Black Sabbath, Sheavy gets the ballroom floor shaking with songs like "Spy vs. Spy," "Hangman" and other tracks from their album "Republic?"
response.title: Sheavy: Republic? At the Masonic Temple
